Hi,

You could try placing the configuration files in the shell. You might also find this article in MSDN about resource dictionaries useful:
http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/cc903952%28VS.95%29.aspx.

I'm leaving the work item as proposed, so that the team considers providing an alternative to fulfill this scenario on a future release.

Thank you for your feedback.
